data.lyric:
[ti:Funeral (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Wayne]
[al:Funeral (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Funeral (Explicit) - Lil Wayne (李尔·韦恩)
[00:04.00]Lyrics by：Jonathan Buice/Dwayne Carter/Mario K Jefferson/Darius Ginn Jr
[00:08.01]Composed by：Jonathan Buice/Dwayne Carter/Mario K Jefferson/Darius Ginn Jr
[00:12.02]Welcome to the funeral yeah
[00:17.53]Closed casket as usual
[00:23.48]Yeah welcome to the funeral
[00:26.55]The quietest things in musicals
[00:29.54]Kumbaya is beautiful
[00:32.43]I bust in with that Uzi though
[00:35.19]And they look like they saw Lucifer
[00:41.23]Welcome to the funeral
[00:43.79]We not welcome we intruded though
[00:46.61]You wanted smoke until you blew the smoke
[00:53.04]That's just inexcusable
[00:55.94]Welcome to the funeral where we from we ruin them
[00:58.83]Been to quite a few of them
[01:01.55]The reverend talk we boo'in him
[01:04.49]We throw up the Piru at them
[01:07.52]Welcome to the funeral closed casket as usual
[01:10.76]Soul snatching as usual
[01:12.57]Amen hallelujah though
[01:14.48]Whole family delusional
[01:16.11]N***as crying like two year olds
[01:17.86]Bullet holes come through the doors
[01:19.32]I just crossed my heart then I threw a rose
[01:21.06]D**n welcome to your funeral
[01:23.10]Everybody knew you bro
[01:24.81]Ain't nobody shooting though
[01:26.66]Gotta die to see who you know
[01:28.04]D**n welcome to the funeral
[01:30.12]Where we from we ruin them
[01:31.64]The preacher preach we shooting them
[01:33.39]Now we need one for you and him
[01:35.22]That's why they should cremate ya
[01:36.87]Hope when you die they commemorate you
[01:38.53]Life is a movie and it's in theaters
[01:40.27]Some of y'alls already went to cable
[01:41.97]These shots from a far you could get a facial
[01:43.75]Black gun chrome gun interracial
[01:45.55]W**d so strong need ventilation
[01:47.17]Funeral home need renovation
[01:48.68]I got your mom's teary eyed that's precipitation
[01:50.70]N***a when you died did your b***h a favor
[01:52.54]N***a we gonna mob like the Genovese's
[01:54.33]N***a fat mob I'ma Jenny Craig 'em
[01:55.90]Drive bys in a winnebago
[01:57.33]Snipers never hear the baby crib a cradle of tomatoes on your head
[02:00.18]I split tomatoes from 100 feet away now it's a halo
[02:02.69]That's tomato sauce Heinz 57
[02:04.36]Catch a n***a you behind where I left you
[02:06.42]I hate your b***h your mom
[02:07.53]A your fellas kids cousins uncles aunts and your nephews
[02:10.42]Shoot a p***y n***a in the face closed casket
[02:12.06]Look his pretty kids in the face poor bastard
[02:13.99]Tears running down a b***h face romantic
[02:15.61]Two straps I'm up at the Oboe Jacksons
[02:18.09]In his face closed casket
[02:19.16]Send him on the highway to heaven no traffic
[02:20.90]My lil n***a just caught a body he ecstatic
[02:22.71]He cried tears of joy then he got him tatted
[02:24.47]Welcome to the funeral closed casket as usual
[02:27.91]Whole family delusional
[02:29.68]Amen hallelujah though
[02:31.41]Choir singing musicals Kumbaya it's beautiful
[02:34.82]I bust in with the uzi though
[02:36.48]They look like they saw Lucifer
[02:38.26]Yeah welcome to the funeral everybody knew your bro
[02:41.98]Ain't nobody shoot him though
[02:43.87]That's just inexcusable
[02:45.52]Welcome to the funeral
[02:47.15]Where we from we ruin them
[02:48.92]Been to quite a few of them
[02:50.36]A n***a got immune of them
[02:52.41]Shoot a p***y n***a in the face closed casket
[02:54.61]Huh huh bop
[02:56.02]Look his pretty kids in the face poor bastards
[02:58.12]Godd**n drive bys in a winnebago
[03:00.51]Snipers never hear the baby crib a cradle of tomatoes on your head
[03:03.37]I split tomatoes from 100 feet away now it's a halo
[03:07.61]In other words a n***a did
data.trans:
[ti:Funeral (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Wayne]
[al:Funeral (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.00]//
[00:08.01]//
[00:12.02]欢迎来参加葬礼
[00:17.53]像往常一样合上棺材
[00:23.48]欢迎来参加葬礼
[00:26.55]这是音乐剧里最安静的时刻
[00:29.54]这首歌多么动听
[00:32.43]我带着一把乌兹冲锋枪冲进来
[00:35.19]他们仿佛看到了恶魔
[00:41.23]欢迎来参加葬礼
[00:43.79]虽然他们不欢迎我们 我们还是闯了进去
[00:46.61]你总想惹事儿 后来你摊上了大事儿
[00:53.04]简直不可原谅
[00:55.94]欢迎来参加葬礼 在我的家乡 我们会毁了一切
[00:58.83]参加过不少葬礼
[01:01.55]牧师讲话的时候 我们给他喝倒彩
[01:04.49]我们毫不在意他们的心情
[01:07.52]欢迎来参加葬礼 像往常一样合上棺材
[01:10.76]直击灵魂 一如往常
[01:12.57]阿门 哈利路亚
[01:14.48]全家人都患了妄想症
[01:16.11]有些人哭得就像两岁小孩
[01:17.86]门上好多子弹孔
[01:19.32]我在胸口画个十 然后扔下一朵玫瑰
[01:21.06]欢迎来参加你的葬礼
[01:23.10]每个人都认识你 兄弟
[01:24.81]但是没人胡乱开枪
[01:26.66]人只有死了之后才知道谁是真朋友
[01:28.04]欢迎来参加葬礼
[01:30.12]在我的家乡 我们会毁了一切
[01:31.64]牧师传教的时候 我们开枪射击
[01:33.39]现在我们需要为你和他请个牧师来
[01:35.22]所以说他们应该火葬你
[01:36.87]希望你死后 他们会纪念你
[01:38.53]人生就是一场电影 就像一出戏
[01:40.27]你们有些人已经为人熟知
[01:41.97]远处飞来的子弹 可能会正中你的脸
[01:43.75]黑色的枪 银色的枪 混合使用
[01:45.55]烟味好浓 需要通风
[01:47.17]一场葬礼过后 家里需要翻新一下
[01:48.68]我让你的母亲泪流成河 简直泪如雨下
[01:50.70]兄弟 当你死去时 帮你女人一个忙
[01:52.54]兄弟 我们会像热那亚家族一样横行霸道
[01:54.33]兄弟 那些家伙真是不得了 我要给他们降降温
[01:55.90]开着房车 掏枪射击
[01:57.33]狙击手什么都不听 扣动扳机 让你脑袋开花
[02:00.18]百尺开外我都能命中一颗番茄 谁都逃不掉
[02:02.69]瞬间变成番茄酱
[02:04.36]抓住那家伙 我把你们甩在身后
[02:06.42]我讨厌你的女人 你的母亲
[02:07.53]你的朋友 孩子 表哥表弟 叔叔阿姨 还有你的侄子
[02:10.42]一枪打在孬种脸上 合上棺材
[02:12.06]看着他可爱孩子的脸庞 可怜的混蛋
[02:13.99]眼泪哗啦啦的流 真是个多情的娘们
[02:15.61]带着两把枪 出现在酒吧里
[02:18.09]冲到他面前 合上棺材盖
[02:19.16]送他走上通往天堂的快车道
[02:20.90]我的小弟刚刚杀了一个人 他欣喜若狂
[02:22.71]流出了喜悦的泪水 然后他去做了一个纹身
[02:24.47]欢迎来参加葬礼 像往常一样合上棺材
[02:27.91]全家人都得了妄想症
[02:29.68]阿门 哈利路亚
[02:31.41]优美的歌声 缓缓响起 就像音乐剧
[02:34.82]我带着一把乌兹冲锋枪冲进来
[02:36.48]他们仿佛看到了恶魔
[02:38.26]欢迎来参加葬礼 每个人都认识你
[02:41.98]但没人攻击他
[02:43.87]简直不可原谅
[02:45.52]欢迎来参加葬礼
[02:47.15]在我们的家乡 我们会毁了一切
[02:48.92]参加了不少葬礼
[02:50.36]我已经对此没有感觉
[02:52.41]一枪打在孬种脸上 合上棺材
[02:54.61]动起来
[02:56.02]看着他可爱孩子的脸庞 可怜的混蛋
[02:58.12]开着房车 掏枪射击
[03:00.51]狙击手什么都不听 扣动扳机 让你脑袋开花
[03:03.37]百尺开外我都能命中一颗番茄 谁都逃不掉
[03:07.61]换句话说 我是个强者
